General.Name: BH Co. Ltd
General.Description: BH Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells flexible printed circuit boards (FPCB) and its application parts. The company provides single side, double side, multi-layer, build up, and rigid FPCBs for use in LCD module, PDP drive, interstitial via hole, and high density interconnector applications. BH Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Incheon, South Korea.
